unnormalised: Yeah, I visited Vaishno Devi last year in Oct. It was peak season, so the wait time for darshan was like 6 hrs! Booked my helicopter tickets online for ₹2500 per person, which saved a lot of time. Remember to carry warm clothes as the temp can drop to 10°C even in Oct. Jai Mata Di!
normalised: Yeah, I visited Vaishno Devi last year in October. It was peak season, so the wait time for darshan was like six hours! Booked my helicopter tickets online for rupee two thousand five hundred per person, which saved a lot of time. Remember to carry warm clothes as the temperature can drop to ten degree celsius even in October. Jai Mata Di!
